character.name: Peaches
description: Your supervisor. Her cards <c=downside>DISARM</c> your ship and <c=status>FURY</c> to deal huge damage at once.

makeFast.cardSelectText:
Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>fast</c> to, forever.
(<c=cardtrait>Fast</c> cards don't ruin <c=cardtrait>priority</c> cards when they're played before them!)

Bide.name: Fury
Bide.description: Add {0} damage to the next card attack.

HardWorker.name: Hard Worker
HardWorker.description: After playing a card that costs 2 or more <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, gain {0} <c=status>FURY</c>.

NeverendingRage.name: Neverending Rage
NeverendingRage.description: The next time you would lose any amount of <c=status>FURY</c>, instead lose 1 neverending rage.

Disarmed.name: Disarmed
Disarmed.description: Attacks do nothing. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

FakeMissing1.name: Crewmate 1 is missing
FakeMissing1.description: The next {0} <c=white>Crewmate 1</c> cards you play do nothing.

FakeMissing2.name: Crewmate 2 is missing
FakeMissing2.description: The next {0} <c=white>Crewmate 2</c> cards you play do nothing.

priority.name: Priority
priority.description: This card has two separate sets of actions. If only <c=cardtrait>priority</c> cards (or no cards) have been played this turn, the first set is played, <c=faint>otherwise the second set is played.
priority.descriptionOff: This card has two separate sets of actions. <c=faint>If only <c=cardtrait>priority</c> cards (or no cards) have been played this turn, the first set is played,</c> otherwise the second set is played.

PunchingBag.name: PUNCHING BAG
PunchingBag.description: Non-<c=dea0a0>Peaches</c> cards and non-card attacks ignore <c=status>DISARM</c>.

YogaLessons.name: YOGA LESSONS
YogaLessons.description: Whenever you receive <c=status>SHIELD</c> or <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>, spend 1 <c=status>FURY</c> to increase the amount gained by 1.

PriorityMail.name: PRIORITY MAIL
PriorityMail.description: The first card you play each turn is <c=cardtrait>fast</c>.

FramedPhotograph.name: FRAMED PHOTOGRAPH
FramedPhotograph.description: When your ship would lose all its hull, lose all but one max hull instead, gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c> and 7 <c=status>FURY</c>. <c=downside>Can only trigger once.</c>

SurveillanceDrones.name: SURVEILLANCE DRONES
SurveillanceDrones.description: Whenever you spend any amount of <c=status>FURY</c>, gain as much <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

BigGuns.name: BIG GUNS
BigGuns.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Cards always cost at least 1 energy to play.</c>

description.None: X = <c=status>fury</c>. Lose all <c=status>fury</c>. Add a <c=card>Break the Bottle</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: X = <c=status>fury</c>. Lose all <c=status>fury</c>. Add a <c=card>Break the Bottle</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>, <c=cardtrait>discounted</c>.
description.B: X = <c=status>fury</c>. Lose all <c=status>fury</c>. Add a <c=card>Break the Bottle B</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

description.None: Attack for <c=damage>{{Damage}}</c> damage. (Affected <c=keyword>twice</c> by damage increases.)
description.A: Attack for <c=damage>{{Damage}}</c> damage. (Affected <c=keyword>twice</c> by damage increases.)
description.B: Attack for <c=damage>{{Damage}}</c> damage. (Affected <c=keyword>thrice</c> by damage increases.)

None.priority: Discard all <c=attack>attacking</c> cards and draw as many cards + 2<c=faint>/1</c>.
None.noPriority: Discard all <c=attack>attacking</c> cards and draw as many cards + <c=faint>2/</c>1.

A.priority: Discard all attacking cards and draw as many cards + 3<c=faint>/2</c>.
A.noPriority: Discard all attacking cards and draw as many cards + <c=faint>3/</c>2.

B.priority: Discard all attacking cards and draw as many cards + 2<c=faint>/1</c>.
B.noPriority: Discard all attacking cards and draw as many cards + <c=faint>2/</c>1.

None.priority: Gain 3<c=faint>/5</c> <c=status>disarm</c>. Add <c=card>The Storm</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
None.noPriority: Gain <c=faint>3/</c>5 <c=status>disarm</c>. Add <c=card>The Storm</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

A.priority: Gain 3<c=faint>/5</c> <c=status>disarm</c>. Add <c=card>The Storm A</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
A.noPriority: Gain <c=faint>3/</c>5 <c=status>disarm</c>. Add <c=card>The Storm A</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

B.priority: Gain 2<c=faint>/4</c> <c=status>disarm</c>. Add <c=card>The Storm</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
B.noPriority: Gain <c=faint>2/</c>4 <c=status>disarm</c>. Add <c=card>The Storm</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

description.None: Gain 1 <c=status>disarm</c>. Draw all <c=action>attacking</c> cards from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Gain 1 <c=status>disarm</c> and 1 <c=energy>energy</c>. Draw all <c=action>attacking</c> cards from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Draw all <c=action>attacking</c> cards from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

None.priority: Random enemy part becomes <c=parttrait>brittle</c><c=faint>/weak</c> until hit.
None.noPriority: Random enemy part becomes <c=faint>brittle/</c><c=parttrait>weak</c> until hit.

Gain 1 <c=status>fury</c>.
Random enemy part becomes <c=parttrait>brittle</c><c=faint>/weak</c> until hit.
A.noPriority:
Gain 1 <c=status>fury</c>.
Random enemy part becomes <c=faint>brittle/</c><c=parttrait>weak</c> until hit.
